sections.comments: THIS COURSE WILL BE DELIVERED ASYNCHRONOUSLY THROUGH CANVAS. This means that there are no scheduled class meetings. Instead, the content will consist of remotely delivered modules, each of which will include a reading assignment, video and audio files, and lecture slides. We will use the Discussions tool in Canvas for discussion and questions arising about the class content.

description: Ways in which the 'self' has been portrayed in eastern and western religious traditions. Thinkers to be considered include Aristotle, Mencius, Freud, Xunzi (Hs√ºn-tzu), Nietzche, and Zhuangzi (Chuang-tzu).
